channel.title: Pi player clipping?
channel.description:
Base: 317 Problem: when u click to attack a player, you move then stop and have to repeately click to attack somebody if they move, it like takes 2 steps then stops. Compiler errors n/a
I have npc clip/Player clip
Now when i click to attack somebody it runs then stops and i have to click again
Paying for fix antonyharding2255@hotmail.com
